title: griddy
author: griddy
content: As the title says, i made a new URL shortener and i want to promote it.I have a budget of ~100$ in LTC and DOGE each and ready to spend it if needed.Should i advertise it on PTC? Will it be effective?Is there any URL shortener aggregator / list where i can add my shortener?Do i have some other options i missed?thanks in advance
